title: True Teryn
description: ALL BEGINNINGS COME AT A PRICE. ARE YOU WILLING TO PAY IT?Lilla must recruit the biggest and most dangerous army in the Seven Galaxies, but the Teryn emperor will not comply unless Lilla earns the blessing of the Teryn Guardian Goddess Laoise.Dealing with gods is never easy. Guardian Goddess Laoiseâ€™s condition for bestowing her blessing is for Lilla to bring her the mysterious Heart Amulet. Now Lilla is trapped in a strange place with no way out, no idea where to go or how to find the amulet.The only way for Lilla to complete her mission is to uncover the biggest secret of all Teryns. Will she survive discovering the secret of what it means to be a True Teryn?
author: S.G. Blaise
